ygData.subject: l33t sP3@k and "gay"
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Owen: I was under the impression that tolerance was on the upswing, in general anyway. It seems like on EQ that isn t the case. Is this server specific or
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, Owen:

"I was under the impression that tolerance was on the upswing, in
general anyway. It seems like on EQ that isn't the case. Is this
server specific or do any of the rest of you have problems with this?"

It seems to be the newest "thing" to say for the l33td00dz - whenever it
happens on our server (Lanys T'Vyl, home of Ordo Ursi Prismatus), I petition
without fail, and it stops. Just /report, and the last 10 lines of your chat
window will be sent to a Guide.

I was so proud of my 15 year old nephew, Greg, when he told one of his
friends to stop using "gay" in that context. At 15, he and his older brother
are very sensitive to the whole gay issue because of my just being around
them, that they jump on that stuff without any prompting from me or my
sister (their mom) - kids can be real heroes sometimes.

Bear hugs to all (and happy Holy Days!),
Jack
october31@...

"I'd follow you through time 'til it's not worth living." Catherine Wheel
